name: Yoyart v. Rubinosky et ux., Appellants

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts-and-Pomeroy, JJ.
parties: Yoyart v. Rubinosky et ux., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Appellants to bear costs.
Mr. Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Herman H. Yaffee, with him Randolph A. Warden, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Yoyart v. Rubinosky et ux., Appellants.
Argued April 24, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts-and-Pomeroy, JJ.
John P. Yatsko, for appellants.
Herman H. Yaffee, with him Randolph A. Warden, for appellee.
October 9, 1970:
